actions.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: Providing for an adjournment of the House from Thursday, May 21, 1992 to Tuesday, May 26, 1992 and an adjournment or recess of the Senate from Thursday, May 21, 1992 or Friday, May 22, 1992 until Monday, June 1, 1992.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from May 21 until May 26, 1992, and a recess or adjournment of the Senate from May 21 or 22 until June 1, 1992.

titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of the House from Thursday, May 21, 1992 to Tuesday, May 26, 1992 and an adjournment or recess of the Senate from Thursday, May 21, 1992 or Friday, May 22, 1992 until Monday, June 1, 1992.
